prompt: Design a retro-themed coming soon page with a centered layout and a nostalgic aesthetic. Feature a bold 'Coming Soon' title in a red (hex: #D32F2F) pixelated font. Include a subtitle in a smaller white font describing an exciting app revival. Display a linear progress indicator with a green (hex: #388E3C) bar and a percentage text below. Add an email input field with a thick black border and a red subscribe button with a pixelated effect. Place social media icons (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn) in a horizontal row at the bottom. Use a dark gray (hex: #424242) background with a subtle grid pattern. Apply moderate padding and spacing for a retro, arcade-like feel.
